Entity.name: fw_agreement_response
Entity.doc: Defines the agreement with the statement responses.

Attribute.name: agreement_statement_context
Attribute.doc: json: The context of the statement. Some statements can have variables with values to expand. If this attribute is filled then it should be expanded in the statement

Attribute.name: expire_date
Attribute.doc: Commitment expire date. If null never expires. Based on the statement expire_date_expression
